insert into t_account_info (user_id, account_no, account_name, ref_account_id, phone, email, purpose, description, creator, create_time, updater, last_modify_time ) values (#{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{accountNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{accountName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{refAccountId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{purpose,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{creator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updater,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{lastModifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} )
mapper.update: update t_account_info set user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, account_no = #{accountNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, account_name = #{accountName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ref_account_id = #{refAccountId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, phone = #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, email = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, purpose = #{purpose,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, description = #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, creator = #{creator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, updater = #{updater,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, last_modify_time = #{lastModifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where account_id = #{accountId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select account_id, user_id, account_no, account_name, ref_account_id, phone, email, purpose, description, creator, create_time, updater, last_modify_time from t_account_info where account_id = #{accountId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
